Sequential¶

class model.Sequential.Sequential(layers)[source]¶

A container for stacking neural network layers in a sequence.

This class manages a list of layers and orchestrates the forward pass of data and the backward pass of gradients.

layers¶

The list of layer objects that make up the network.

Type:

list

params¶

A list of lists containing the trainable parameters (weights and biases) from all layers in the network that have them.

Type:

list

grads¶

A list of lists containing the gradients for each parameter. This list is populated after each call to backward.

Type:

list

backward(output_gradient)[source]¶

Performs the backward pass (backpropagation) for the entire network.

Parameters:

output_gradient (np.ndarray) – The initial gradient from the loss function with respect to the network’s output.

Returns:

A list of lists containing the gradients for all trainable

parameters in the network.

Return type:

list

forward(input_data)[source]¶

Performs the forward pass for the entire network.

Parameters:

input_data (np.ndarray) – The input data for the first layer.

Returns:

The final output of the network after passing through all layers.

Return type:

np.ndarray
